itemDescription: English college head and educational administrator

wikipedia_page.main: Blanche Athena Clough (1861–1960) was a British classicist and educational administrator who was the Principal of Newnham College (1920–1923).

response: On the death of her brother Arthur, she moved to Surrey, to support her sister-in-law Blanche Clough in bringing up their three small children. The youngest daughter, Blanche Athena Clough, would follow in her aunt's footsteps and herself become a notable educationalist.
